overview: The wife of a struggling artist is raped and begins painting a series of erotic images in an attempt to exorcise her demons.  However the men in her paintings all have the same face as her rapist, and as her work becomes more popular the man begins to take on folk-hero status...
tagline: A terrible woman's sex!  The emotions of a wreaking woman!  Lustful drawing accompanied by tremendous glory! !
title: Eros Schedule Book: Female Artist
